Southfield.WFCB-LP: WFCB-LP is a community radio station in Ferndale, Michigan owned by Underwood V Radio, Incorporated (pronounced "Underwood Five Radio"), having launched in 2016 on 100.7 MHz. The station covers the immediate Ferndale and Royal Oak areas, as well as portions of Detroit's North End. The station's application was confirmed as acceptable by Industry Canada for coordination purposes under NARBA, on July 25, 2014 and its construction permit was granted on August 7, 2014.
